root.name: Deer Hunter 2005
root.description: So I've heard that you're tired of shooting space monsters and nazis. Why don't you go and hunt, the old fashioned way? No laser cannons or over sized melee weapons. Just you, the woods, the animal and your rifle. Customize your own personal weapon that suits you the best. Explore the environment on horse back or while driving your Quad. You're also able to test your skills in the multiplayer mode!Deer Hunter 2005 was never released in Europe.
